name: PhallusBench 2021
description:
PhallusBench 2021: The only good benchmarking software.

PhallusBench 2021 provides stunning visuals that only the latest in PC hardware could even possibly grasp without going supercritical. If you try to run this on your internet-enabled chastity cage, it would actually just melt your balls off. It's just that next-gen. It pairs beautiful lighting effects with DICKSWORD(tm) - the latest in penis-based simulation technology.

Simply run, and enjoy! Run on Linux for highest FPS.
